entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. 60 percent chance of wet snow over the Cypress Hills overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 12 except 7 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Showers. Wet snow over the Cypress Hills early in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12 except 7 near the Alberta border. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 26 April 2023
